alert.message_logout: Are you sure you want to log out?
alert.message_error_network: Your Internet connection appears to be offline or too weak. Please try again later.
alert.photo_unavailable_message: Photo library is not available. Please check your iPhone settings for this app and enable Photos.
alert.camera_unavailable_message: Camera is not available. Please check your iPhone settings for this app and enable Camera.
alert.photo_access_denied_message: Actors Axis doesn't have access to your photos. To enable access, tap Settings and turn on Photos.
alert.camera_access_denied_message: Actors Axis doesn't have access to your camera. To enable access, tap Settings and turn on Camera.
alert.micro_unavailable_message: Micro is not available. Please check your Phone settings for this app and enable Micro.
alert.micro_access_denied_message: Actors Axis doesn't have access to your micro. To enable access, tap Settings and turn on Micro.
alert.message_error_default: Something went wrong. Please try again.
alert.open_notification_settings: You need to allow notifications on your device to receive notification. Go to device settings?

error_validate_field.password_special_character: must contain at least 1 number and 1 special character
error_validate_field.user_in_valid_first_character: the first character must be an ascii letters (a-Z),number (0-9)
error_validate_field.user_in_valid_end_character: the last character  must be an ascii letters (a-Z),number (0-9)
error_validate_field.user_in_valid_contain_character: cannot contain consecutive underscore(_), hyphens(-), and periods(.)
error_validate_field.user_name_valid: only letters (a-Z),number (0-9),underscore and hyphens, and periods(.) are allowed
error_validate_field.email_taken: That email is taken. Try another!
error_validate_field.user_name_taken: That username is taken. Try another!
error_validate_field.term_invalid: Please indicate that you have read and agree to the Term of Service
